home.description: I am a 3D interior designer, at the moment I have more than 30 works

aboutMe.name: Alexey Leonov | 3D Designer
aboutMe.description: Hi there! My name is Alexey, and I am a 3D designer based in Grodno. I have 2 years of experience in the field and specialize in 3D modeling. I love working with clients to bring their ideas to life, and I am always looking for new projects to take on.
